text: When I get the morning report on security, I call those battalions in the regions where there are problems.
author: Alvaro Uribe

text: Running clears my mind, and gives me a reason to get out of bed in the morning.
author: Ronnie O'Sullivan

text: I like to wake up each morning feeling a new man.
author: Jean Harlow

text: I'm pretty much a 9-to-5 kind of guy. I usually get to work about 8 in the morning, and I work until 4 or 5, and sometimes I work on Saturday and Sunday mornings. Pretty much I keep the same hours as an accountant or clerk or whatever.
author: Douglas Preston

text: Man, if I made one million dollars I would come in at six in the morning, sweep the stands, wash the uniforms, clean out the office, manage the team and play the games.
author: Duke Snider
